value.title: Natural Language Processing (NLP) Zero to Hero with TensorFlow
value.excerpt: Welcome to Zero to Hero for Natural Language Processing using TensorFlow! If you’re not an expert on AI or ML, don’t worry -- we’re taking the concepts of NLP and teaching them from first principles with our host Laurence Moroney.

topItems.title: Natural Language Processing - Tokenization (NLP Zero to Hero - Part 1)
topItems.excerpt: Welcome to Zero to Hero for Natural Language Processing using TensorFlow! If you’re not an expert on AI or ML, don’t worry -- we’re taking the concepts of NLP and teaching them from first principles with our host Laurence Moroney (@lmoroney).  In this first lesson we’ll talk about how to represent words
topItems.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/fNxaJsNG3-s" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

topItems.title: Sequencing - Turning sentences into data (NLP Zero to Hero - Part 2)
topItems.excerpt: Welcome to Zero to Hero for Natural Language Processing using TensorFlow! If you’re not an expert on AI or ML, don’t worry -- we’re taking the concepts of NLP and teaching them from first principles with our host Laurence Moroney (@lmoroney).  In the last video you learned about how to tokenize words
topItems.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/r9QjkdSJZ2g" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

topItems.title: Training a model to recognize sentiment in text (NLP Zero to Hero - Part 3)
topItems.excerpt: Welcome to Zero to Hero for Natural Language Processing using TensorFlow! If you’re not an expert on AI or ML, don’t worry -- we’re taking the concepts of NLP and teaching them from first principles with our host Laurence Moroney (@lmoroney).  In the last couple of episodes you saw how to tokenize text
topItems.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/Y_hzMnRXjhI" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

topItems.title: ML with Recurrent Neural Networks (NLP Zero to Hero - Part 4)
topItems.excerpt: Welcome to this episode in Natural Language Processing Zero to Hero with TensorFlow. In the previous videos in this series you saw how to tokenize text, and use sequences of tokens to train a neural network. In the next videos we’ll look at how neural networks can generate text and even write poetry,
topItems.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/OuYtk9Ymut4" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: From Languages to Information | Stanford University
value.excerpt: The online world has a vast array of unstructured information in the form of language and social networks. Learn how to make sense of it and how to interact with humans via language, from answering questions to giving advice!

value.title: Natural Language Processing (NLP) Tutorial with Python & NLTK
value.excerpt: This video will provide you with a comprehensive and detailed knowledge of Natural Language Processing, popularly known as NLP. You will also learn about the different steps involved in processing the human language like Tokenization, Stemming, Lemmatization and more. Python, NLTK, & Jupyter Notebook
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/X2vAabgKiuM" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Training an AI to create poetry (NLP Zero to Hero - Part 6)
value.excerpt: Through this series so far you’ve been learning the basics of NLP using TensorFlow. You saw how to tokenize and then sequence text, preparing it to train neural networks. You saw how sentiment in text can be represented with embeddings, and how the semantics of text over long stretches might be learned

value.title: ML with Recurrent Neural Networks (NLP Zero to Hero - Part 4)
value.excerpt: Welcome to this episode in Natural Language Processing Zero to Hero with TensorFlow. In the previous videos in this series you saw how to tokenize text, and use sequences of tokens to train a neural network. In the next videos we’ll look at how neural networks can generate text and even write poetry,
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/OuYtk9Ymut4" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Long Short-Term Memory for NLP (NLP Zero to Hero - Part 5)
value.excerpt: Welcome to episode 5 of our Natural Language Processing with TensorFlow series. In this video we’re going to take a look at how to manage the understanding of context in language across longer sentences, where we can see that the impact of a word early in the sentence can determine the meaning and semantics
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/A9QVYOBjZdY" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Natural Language Processing with TensorFlow 2 - Beginner's Course
value.excerpt: This course is a practical introduction to natural language processing with TensorFlow 2.0. In this tutorial you will go from having zero knowledge to writing an artificial intelligence that can compose Shakespearean prose.  No prior experience with deep learning is required, though it is always helpful
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/B2q5cRJvqI8" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Natural Language Processing In 10 Minutes | NLP Tutorial For Beginners | NLP Training | Simplilearn
value.excerpt: Natural Language Processing is a popular application of Artificial Intelligence. This video on NLP in 10 minutes will make you understand why we need NLP and what NLP is. You will get an idea about NPL Pipelines and the basic processes involved in text parsing. Finally, we will talk about some real world

value.title: NLTK Python Tutorial | Natural Language Processing (NLP) With Python Using NLTK | Simplilearn
value.excerpt: Natural Language Processing is a technique that is widely used in the field of AI and Machine Learning. In this video, you learn about the NLTK library and its use for natural language processing and text mining tasks. You will look at Speech Recognition, Spam Filtering, and Sentiment Analysis. You will
